pos review: Comfortable beds, good size rooms and reat showers.
neg review: Scrambled eggs at were made of something other than egg!

pos review: Really large room for this Price. And the location is perfect.

neg review: The room was full of mosquitoes. We barely slept 2 hours and spent the whole night trying to kill them all -> evidences on the wall . ( sorry for that) Our body is covered by bites

pos review: Location is suberb. Breakfast is delicious. Very authentic hotel.

neg review: Booked a Superior room based on the Booking Web site photos to get the best quality room. But on arrival given a room no better than Standard in quality. Management said all rooms different, but I said that the room paid for should still be of a similar Superior standard to that advertised. They blamed Booking.com for this but I don't. Very misleading - be warned! Make certain you are going to get what you are paying for!

pos review: The location is absolutely perfect for sightseeing. The flavor and atmosphere of the hotel is fantastic. It is as if you were in an ancient building.
neg review: In fact, this was my second time I went there and I couldn't find anything which was not at the level of my expectations. Nothing I dislike of the Monasterium.

pos review: Very helpful friendly staff and great location
